 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package gui.common

Interface Summary
ButtonBankListener ButtonBankListener is the callback interface for ButtonBankPanel.
IController IController defines functionality that is supported by all controllers in the program.
IView IView defines functionality that is supported by all views in the program.
 

Class Summary
ButtonBankPanel ButtonBankPanel can be used to easily create a horizontal bank of buttons, and to respond to the action events generated when the buttons are pressed.
Controller Controller is a base class that provides common functionality required by all controllers in the program (i.e., all controller classes extend Controller).
DialogBox Used to display modal dialog boxes.
DialogView Base class for all views that are displayed in dialog boxes.
GridBagConstraintsExt GridBagConstraintsExt is an extension of GridBagConstraints with an additional operation which makes it easy to reset the (x, y, width, height) properties in one shot.
TableOperations TableOperations provides useful utility functions for operating on JTables.
Tagable Tagable is the base class for all classes used to pass data into views.
TreeOperations TreeOperations provides useful utility functions for operating on JTrees.
View View is a base class that provides common functionality required by all views in the program (i.e., view classes extend View instead of JPanel).
 

Enum Summary
FileFormat Enumeration defining all the output file formats supported by the program.
SizeUnits Enumeration defining all the units of measurement (including weight, volume, and count) supported by the program.
